description.value:
Aerosol can of liquids that are safe when wet, but on drying explode on any sudden contact (such as a bullet or thrown rock). Does 1d5+3 X Damage per kilo used. Blast Radius is 2 metres per kilo used.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
